relativeUrl.value: @concat('subscriptions/', dataset().subscriptionId, '/providers/microsoft.Insights/metrics?timespan=', dataset().startDate, 'T00:00:00.000Z/', dataset().endDate, 'T00:00:00.000Z&interval=PT1H&metricnames=Percentage CPU&region=', dataset().location, '&aggregation=average&api-version=2021-05-01&metricNamespace=microsoft.compute/virtualmachines&$filter=Microsoft.ResourceId eq ',dataset().wildcard)
